title: How to emphasise in HTML
body: Inside `em` HTML element. You can write it in this way: ```HTML This is emphasis ``` **Example:** *This is emphasis*

title: What are the main sections of vue files?
body:
`Script`, `Template`, and `Style` are the main sections of vue files.

For example:
```vue
<script setup>
\\ Your JS
<\script>

<template>
<!-- Your HTML -->
</template>

<style>
\* Your CSS *\
</style>
```
